childMarkdownRemark.html:
Lark Fontaine Textiles is excited to announce the release of multiple SKU's that are high-performing with soil and stain repellency, antimicrobial and anti-bacterial finishes all while providing a luxurious hand in a wide variety of in stock colors and textures for upholstery. Our textiles are ideal for everyday living as they are kid and pet friendly and easily cleanable with water.

Lark Fontaine addresses a need in the market for a luxurious cleanable textile collection and understands the needs for hospitality and residential interiors.

internal.content:

siteMetadata.description: Design & technical partner to the Arizona A+D community, Loop Architectural Materials represents leading brands in contract furniture, glass, and architectural/interior design products.
siteMetadata.title: Loop Architectural Materials
